caption.title: Modelled spatial distributions of Hymenoscyphus fraxineus.
caption.p: Modelled spatial distribution (as probability of occurrence) of H. fraxineus calculated from a model based on the physiological tolerances of H. fraxineus to temperature using the limits defined by Hauptman et al. 23 (see Supplementary Figure S3). Map was produced using Matlab R2015b ( http://www.mathworks.com).
